adrFormatAddress: 5 Hamilton Pl, New York, NY 10031, USA

originalText.text: Jose and his mobile X-ray service were exactly what my mom needed. She was homebound, recovering from surgery that left her with paralysis, when her ankle was injured. Neither the VNA nurse, nor her PCP, could figure out who to refer us to for a homebound X-ray. I found Jose’s service online and gave him a call. He answered right away, was wonderful to coordinate with. He arrived in less than 2 hours! We had the results back the same evening. His care was compassionate and professional. We really couldn’t have asked for a better provider! We will be passing along his info to our doctors/ nurses who had no idea who to refer to and any friends who need it. Excellent experience! Thank you, Jose!

text.text: Jose and his mobile X-ray service were exactly what my mom needed. She was homebound, recovering from surgery that left her with paralysis, when her ankle was injured. Neither the VNA nurse, nor her PCP, could figure out who to refer us to for a homebound X-ray. I found Jose’s service online and gave him a call. He answered right away, was wonderful to coordinate with. He arrived in less than 2 hours! We had the results back the same evening. His care was compassionate and professional. We really couldn’t have asked for a better provider! We will be passing along his info to our doctors/ nurses who had no idea who to refer to and any friends who need it. Excellent experience! Thank you, Jose!

originalText.text: Jose is the best!  I broke my tibia, was unable to walk or put any pressure on my foot.  My orthopedist ordered X-rays each a month apart, Jose actually came to the house for both.  What a relief because I could not get out!  He is flexible with appointments, also arriving in the early evening if needed.  Jose is not only professional but packs an awesome personality.  I admired his kindness, the respect he showed me and his ability to make me feel at ease.  Kudos to you my friend—you were a bright light during a dark period, and I thank you❤️

originalText.text:
I was very pleased with this service.  Jose, the technician, could not have been any nicer.  He was knowledgeable, very helpful, congenial, and an overall pleasure to work with.
He made things easy at a very stressful time.

originalText.text: I had the best experience with this Radiology it’s very practical and easy.  It was perfect for my 99 year old mother they came very fast did the X-ray and left   They gave me the results in less than 2 hours.
